description: This is the main entry point for a React application, responsible for rendering the root React component ('App') into the DOM element with id 'root'. It initializes the React DOM root and wraps the 'App' component in React.StrictMode for highlighting potential issues.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Initializes a React root for rendering React components into a specified DOM node.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM.
